item.title: Scania PGR-Series 2004 – 2018 v1.1 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | December 9, 2024

Scania PGR-Series 2004 – 2018 v1.1 ETS2

Changelog 1.1
– UI icons in progress
– Added translations for dots
– Fixed chassis height
– Fixed fender holder
– Added DC13 370 engine (+ badges)
– Added DC13 400 engine (+ badges)
– Added SWIFT badge (stock, chrome, paint) to PGR1 grill
– Added ADR, A & TIR sign left
– Added ADR, A & TIR sign right
– Added lowdeck tanks
– Fixed big fueltanks left shape
– Added Kenwood radio to the interior
– rebuilt doorsteps
– reworked doorstep frame
– reworked headlight shape
– splitted H4 lamps up in variants with plastic and painted trim piece
– fixed fender shape
– added Streamline day cab fenders
– added half-painted fenders to the rear
– added plastic bumper light cover inside
– added bumper light cover outside
– optimized texture size
– corrected seat adjustment (done by DaStrobel)
– added window behind both doors
– added window behind passanger door
– added interior rearwall for window behind both doors
– added interior rearwall for window behind passanger door
– rebuilt CR14L and CP14L cab
– added CR16L cab
– added CP16L cab
– added to the 4×2 chassis new stock tank options
– added to the 2700mm and 2900mm chassis new stock tank options

Tanks with painted straps:
– No cover battery left stoc
– No cover battery left paint
– No cover battery rear Adblue right (E5/6 only)
– No cover battery rear Adblue left (E5/6 only)
– Cover stock battery rear Adblue right (E5/6 only)
– Cover stock battery rear Adblue left (E5/6 only)
– Cover paint battery rear Adblue right (E5/6 only)
– Cover paint battery rear Adblue left (E5/6 only)
– Cover right stock battery left stock
– Cover right stock battery left paint
– Cover right paint battery left stock
– Cover right paint battery left paint
– Steps paint
– Steps stock

Tanks fullpaint:
– No cover battery left stock
– No cover battery left paint
– No cover battery rear Adblue right (E5/6 only)
– No cover battery rear Adblue left (E5/6 only)
– Cover stock battery rear Adblue right (E5/6 only)
– Cover stock battery rear Adblue left (E5/6 only)
– Cover paint battery rear Adblue right (E5/6 only)
– Cover paint battery rear Adblue left (E5/6 only)
– Cover right stock battery left stock
– Cover right stock battery left paint
– Cover right paint battery left stoc
– Cover right paint battery left paint
– Steps paint
– Steps stock
– added sideskirts for Euro 6 V8 cover right option
– rebuilt all Topline R cab spoilers long
– rebuilt Topline spoiler short
– rebuilt Highline spoiler high
– rebuilt Highline spoiler flat
– rebuilt Highline spoiler short high
– rebuilt Highline spoiler short high 4.2m
– added Highline spoiler short flat
– added a variants with extensions to all stock spoilers
– rebuilt Topline 4.4m short spoiler
– rebuilt normal cab spoiler high
– rebuilt normal cab spoiler short high
– rebuilt normal cab spoiler wing
– added normal cab spoiler flat
– added normal cab spoiler short flat
– rebuilt flat cab spoiler high
– rebuilt flat cab spoiler short high
– rebuilt flat cab cab spoiler wing
– rebuilt short cab spoiler high
– added short cab spoiler short high
– rebuilt short cab cab spoiler wing
– added short cab spoiler high
– added short cab spoiler short high
– added short cab cab spoiler wing
– fixed UV mapping on flat cab and normal cab
– fixed UV mapping for all high spoilers
– added a variants with extensions to all stock spoilers
– added tables stock
– added tables beige, black, red, burgundy, green, brown
– added tables with blue, red, darkred, green, grey, yellow pluche
– added steering wheels PGR1 in beige, black, red, blue, burgundy, green, brown
– added steering wheels PGR2 in beige, black, red, blue, burgundy, green, brown
– added interior DLC slots and defs
– fixed mapping of the front window part

SKOR Sports replica:
– fueltanks
– sunvisor
– front steps
– rear bumper
– lightbox
– spoiler
– airbar with stacks
– Mudflap with Talmus
– skin
– license plate

Holtrop vd Vlist replica:
– skin
– fueltanks

Bring replica:
– skin
– beacons
– lightbox

HART replica:
– sideskirts
– chassis cover
– rear bumper
– front bumper
– bullbar
– roofbar
– spoiler
– airbar
– skin
– license plate

Description
The Scania PGR-Series was built by Scania between 2004 and 2018 with major facelifts occuring in 2009 and 2013 and the addition of the G-Series in 2008.

Template and Addons included
Game version: 1.53

Credits: JUseeTV

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: EXPANSION V15.2 1.53 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | December 9, 2024

EXPANSION V15.2 1.53 ATS

Changes v15.2
– various fixes

15.1
added Lawton and Billings stockyards 10/24
reworked Lamar feedlot 10/27
added Roundup Ranch 10/27
added Fort Collins stockyard 10/27
various fixes 10/27
added Fort Worth stockyard 11/01
added Emporia Ranch 11/01

1.53 compatibility 11/02
added San Antonio and Guymon Ranch 11/08
fixed new SCS companies 11/09
updated several sites with dynamic unloads 11/17
updated more sites 11/21
fixed Pueblo-Denver/Marysville Special Transport routes 11/22
added roundbaler, updaed Waco & La Junta 11/26

This mod adds over 200 loading/unloading locations from Montana, Idaho, Utah, Wyoming, Colorado, New Mexico, Oklahoma, Texas, Kansas and Nebraska. Custom garages scattered around the map and Many many ranches and farms added, but thats not all, from logging sites and crazy roads in Montana to custom wind farms at Judith Gap. New crude oil pickups in Wyoming, Oklahoma and Texas. Custom Volvo dealerships in Missoula, Killeen and Victoria. Custom home furniture curbside deliveries around the map to gas station grocery deliveries. The map has all this and more.
If using modded trailers add the cargo addon mod directly above ATS Expansion.
Nebraska is required as are all SCS state DLC’s, Volvo Construction DLC Forestry DLC and Heavy Cargo DLC

Credits: xRECONLOBSTERx, Driver47, Sineptorro

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Military Addon for Ownable Trailer Doll Panther v1.3.18 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | December 9, 2024

Military Addon for Ownable Trailer Doll Panther v1.3.18 ETS2

Adds 50 military cargo for ownable overweight trailer Doll Panther
You need main mod ‘Ownable Overweight Trailer Doll Panther’
Priority in mod manager is not important.
Tested on version 1.53.x
Models by Eugen Systems, Obsidian Entertainment, Bohemia Interactive, Treyarch, Infinity Ward

Version 1.3.18 – compatibility update for patch 1.53, cargo from mod added to new companies from Greece DLC, minor fixes and improvements

Credits: Jazzycat

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | December 9, 2024

Ownable overweight trailer Doll Panther v1.4.20 ETS2

Ownable overweight trailer Doll Panther
Standalone
Advanced coupling
Cables simulation
Customisable
5 axles

70 overweight cargo

item.title: Better Flares v4.5.2 1.53 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | December 8, 2024

Better Flares v4.5.2 1.53 ATS

Changes:
– Various improvements for flare textures
– Slightly increased size for emergency beacons lights
– Added illumination to roadwork barrier lights

in Headlights addon:
– Significantly improved player’s truck lights patterns and their colors
– Added support for 28 modded trucks

in City Lights addon:
– Minor tweaks and improvements for street lamp flares

Key features:
– Completely reworked flares
– Realistic headlights patterns with 3 different colors (up to 50 modded trucks supported
– Modified SCS AI traffic with 9 headlights color variants and 2 red/brake signals in Traffic Addon
– Dimmed street lamps in City Lights Addon

IMPORTANT!
Traffic Addon now require Sound Fixes Pack, otherwise traffic won’t spawn!

Credits: Avelium

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.
